translations: 临时露营，野营（bivouac 的的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: We bivouacked on the outskirts of the city.
I believe, from what I know of him, he was a bit of a rake. We bivouacked together on and off for nearly two years.
sentences.translation: 另外以我对他的了解，这是个有点浪子气息的家伙。我们断断续续地在一起露营了近两年。

sentences.sentence: We bivouacked on the open plain.
sentences.translation: 我们在开阔的原野上露营。
